QuestData.Title: Particular Plumage
QuestData.Description: When the crocs started attacking, they scared a bunch of the lories out of their nests, up in that island to our northwest.$b$bI can use those lories' feathers to make some specialized lures, which will come in handy if and when I get to stop defending my brethren from these reptiles.$b$bYou up for some feather hunting?
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 6 Emerald Tailfeathers, 6 Crimson Tailfeathers, and 6 Dusky Tailfeathers.
QuestData.CompletionText: <A bead of sweat twinkles in the fur above Tony's brow.>
QuestData.RewardText: Thanks, $n. You've made my day. I always hate to see such a prime feather-gathering opportunity go to waste.
